title: Outcome of endoscopic transsphenoidal surgery for acromegaly: Comparison of using and not using the floor standing pneumatic powered endoscope-holder system
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Masahiko Tosaka, Rei Yamaguchi, Kazuhiko Horiguchi, Atsushi Ozawa, Shunichi Matsumoto, Fumiaki Honda, Yohei Hokama, Takaaki Yoshida, Mitsuko Okano, Akihiro Tsukada, Shogo Ishiuchi, Masanobu Yamada, Yuhei Yoshimoto
